Topic.Title: Question about jpg screenshots, and video files

Posts.EditableText: Hi everyone, back again. So remember in Q4 u could display a jpg image? Well, can Q5 do mp3 or play video files? Thanks much, Scott
Posts.HTML:
Hi everyone, back again.

So remember in Q4 u could display a jpg image? Well, can Q5 do mp3 or play video files?


Thanks much,

Scott

Posts.EditableText: Yes you can display JPEG files and play MP3s. You can play videos too from YouTube and Vimeo.
Posts.HTML: Yes you can display JPEG files and play MP3s. You can play videos too from YouTube and Vimeo.
